sources.name: datosVentas
sources.description: Origen con 1,5 millones de registros de Ventas

sinks.name: datosVentasMensuales
sinks.description: Target de Ventas Mensuales por Order Date

transformations.name: totalizarMedidas
transformations.description: Totalización por Order Date en formato numérico

transformations.name: ordenarAAAAMM
transformations.description: Se ordena el Order Date pero en formato numérico YYYYMM

transformations.name: inclusionFechaNumerica
transformations.description: Cambio a formato numérico de "Order Date"

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as date,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as date,
		{Units Sold} as decimal(18,2),
		{Unit Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Unit Cost} as decimal(18,2),
		{Total Revenue} as decimal(18,2),
		{Total Cost} as decimal(18,2),
		{Total Profit} as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> datosVentas
ordenarAAAAMM aggregate(groupBy({Order Date} = inclusionFechaNumerica@{Order Date}),
	{Units Sold} = sum({Units Sold}),
		{Unit Price} = avg({Unit Price}),
		{Unit Cost} = avg({Unit Cost}),
		{Total Revenue} = avg({Total Revenue}),
		{Total Cost} = avg({Total Cost}),
		{Total Profit} = avg({Total Profit}),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> totalizarMedidas
inclusionFechaNumerica sort(asc({Order Date}, true),
	caseInsensitive: true,
	partitionLevel: true) ~> ordenarAAAAMM
datosVentas derive({Order Date} = toInteger(toString({Order Date},'YYYYMM'))) ~> inclusionFechaNumerica
totalizarMedidas sink(input(
		ANNOMES as integer,
		{Units Sold} as decimal(28,2),
		{Unit Price} as decimal(22,6),
		{Unit Cost} as decimal(22,6),
		{Total Revenue} as decimal(22,6),
		{Total Cost} as decimal(22,6),
		{Total Profit} as decimal(22,6)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ANNOMES = {Order Date},
		{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> datosVentasMensuales
